dmca.title: gbshopping.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Jayme [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2006 8:46 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: 'Jayme'
Subject: gbshopping.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)



 

March 24, 2006


SENT VIA Certified Mail
  Return Receipt Requested

7005 3110 0002 2991 1379

 

 

Designated Agent

George Poletes

1333 N Stemmons Pkwy Ste 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 

 

Dear Designated Agent:

            

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you
with respect to unauthorized use of Sony
